tool_description: Accept, process and filter online payments through Square.
name: SquareECommerce
title: SquareECommerce

api_list.name: captureSingleTransaction
api_list.description: This endpoint allows to capture a transaction that was created with the Charge endpoint with a delay_capture value of true.

required_parameters.name: locationId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the location to list transactions for.

required_parameters.name: transactionId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the transaction.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Valid AccessToken.

api_list.name: chargeCard
api_list.description: Charges a card represented by a card nonce or a customer's card on file.

required_parameters.name: locationId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the location to associate the created transaction with.

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description: The amount of money to charge.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Valid AccessToken.

required_parameters.name: currency
required_parameters.description: The type of currency, in ISO 4217 format. For example, the currency code for US dollars is USD. The value of currency must match the currency associated with the business that is charging the card.

required_parameters.name: idempotencyKey
required_parameters.description: A value you specify that uniquely identifies this transaction among transactions you've created.

optional_parameters.name: note
optional_parameters.description: An optional note to associate with the transaction. This value cannot exceed 60 characters.

optional_parameters.name: cardNonce
optional_parameters.description: A nonce generated from the SqPaymentForm that represents the card to charge. The application that provides a nonce to this endpoint must be the same application that generated the nonce with the SqPaymentForm. Otherwise, the nonce is invalid.Do not provide a value for this field if you provide a value for customer_card_id.

optional_parameters.name: billingAddressLine2
optional_parameters.description: The second line of the buyer's billing address.

optional_parameters.name: shippingAddressLine2
optional_parameters.description: The second line of the buyer's shipping address.

optional_parameters.name: delayCapture
optional_parameters.description: If true, the request will only perform an Auth on the provided card. Default value: false

optional_parameters.name: shippingAdministrativeDistrictLevel3
optional_parameters.description: A civil entity within the address's administrative_district_level_2 of the buyer's shipping address.

optional_parameters.name: billingSublocality2
optional_parameters.description: A civil region within the address's sublocality of the buyer's billing address.

optional_parameters.name: buyerEmailAddress
optional_parameters.description: The buyer's email address, if available.

optional_parameters.name: billingLocality
optional_parameters.description: The city or town of the buyer's billing address.

optional_parameters.name: billingAdministrativeDistrictLevel3
optional_parameters.description: A civil entity within the address's administrative_district_level_2 of the buyer's billing address.

optional_parameters.name: shippingSublocality2
optional_parameters.description: A civil region within the address's sublocality of the buyer's shipping address.

optional_parameters.name: shippingLocality
optional_parameters.description: The city or town of the buyer's shipping address.

optional_parameters.name: shippingCountry
optional_parameters.description: The shipping address's country, in ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 format.

optional_parameters.name: billingAdministrativeDistrictLevel1
optional_parameters.description: A civil entity within the address's country of the buyer's billing address. In the US, this is the state.

optional_parameters.name: billingCountry
optional_parameters.description: The billing address's country, in ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 format.

optional_parameters.name: shippingAdministrativeDistrictLevel1
optional_parameters.description: A civil entity within the address's country of the buyer's shipping address. In the US, this is the state.

optional_parameters.name: billingAddressLine1
optional_parameters.description: The first line of the buyer's billing address.

optional_parameters.name: billingAddressLine3
optional_parameters.description: The third line of the buyer's billing address.

optional_parameters.name: referenceId
optional_parameters.description: An optional ID you can associate with the transaction for your own purposes (such as to associate the transaction with an entity ID in your own database). This value cannot exceed 40 characters.

optional_parameters.name: billingSublocality
optional_parameters.description: A civil region within the address's locality of the buyer's billing address.

optional_parameters.name: billingSublocality3
optional_parameters.description: A civil region within the address's sublocality2 of the buyer's billing address.

optional_parameters.name: customerId
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the customer to associate this transaction with. This field is required if you provide a value for customer_card_id, and optional otherwise.

optional_parameters.name: customerCardId
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the customer card on file to charge. Do not provide a value for this field if you provide a value for card_nonce.

optional_parameters.name: shippingAdministrativeDistrictLevel2
optional_parameters.description: A civil entity within the address's administrative_district_level_1 of the buyer's shipping address.

optional_parameters.name: shippingAddressLine3
optional_parameters.description: The third line of the buyer's shipping address.

optional_parameters.name: billingAdministrativeDistrictLevel2
optional_parameters.description: A civil entity within the address's administrative_district_level_1 of the buyer's billing address.

optional_parameters.name: shippingSublocality
optional_parameters.description: A civil region within the address's locality of the buyer's shipping address.

optional_parameters.name: shippingAddressLine1
optional_parameters.description: The first line of the buyer's shipping address.

optional_parameters.name: shippingPostalCode
optional_parameters.description: The shipping address's postal code.

optional_parameters.name: shippingSublocality3
optional_parameters.description: A civil region within the address's sublocality2 of the buyer's shipping address.

optional_parameters.name: billingPostalCode
optional_parameters.description: The billing address's postal code.

api_list.name: createCustomer
api_list.description: This endpoint creates a new customer for a business, which can have associated cards on file.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Valid AccessToken.

optional_parameters.name: addressLine3
optional_parameters.description: The third line of the address, if any.

optional_parameters.name: addressSublocality
optional_parameters.description: A civil region within the address's locality, if any.

optional_parameters.name: givenName
optional_parameters.description: The customer's given (i.e., first) name.

optional_parameters.name: companyName
optional_parameters.description: The name of the customer's company.

optional_parameters.name: addressLine1
optional_parameters.description: The first line of the address.

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: The customer's email address.

optional_parameters.name: addressPostalCode
optional_parameters.description: The address's postal code.

optional_parameters.name: referenceId
optional_parameters.description: An optional second ID you can set to associate the customer with an entity in another system.

optional_parameters.name: addressSublocality3
optional_parameters.description: A civil region within the address's sublocality2, if any.

optional_parameters.name: addressAdministrativeDistrictLevel2
optional_parameters.description: A civil entity within the address's administrative_district_level_1. In the US, this is the county.

optional_parameters.name: addressLine2
optional_parameters.description: The second line of the address, if any.

optional_parameters.name: nickname
optional_parameters.description: A nickname for the customer.

optional_parameters.name: phoneNumber
optional_parameters.description: The customer's phone number.

optional_parameters.name: addressAdministrativeDistrictLevel1
optional_parameters.description: A civil entity within the address's country. In the US, this is the state.

optional_parameters.name: note
optional_parameters.description: An optional note to associate with the customer.

optional_parameters.name: addressLocality
optional_parameters.description: The city or town of the address.

optional_parameters.name: addressAdministrativeDistrictLevel3
optional_parameters.description: A civil entity within the address's administrative_district_level_2, if any.

optional_parameters.name: familyName
optional_parameters.description: The customer's family (i.e., last) name.

optional_parameters.name: addressSublocality2
optional_parameters.description: A civil region within the address's sublocality, if any.

optional_parameters.name: addressCountry
optional_parameters.description: The address's country, in ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 format.

api_list.name: createCustomerCard
api_list.description: Adds a card on file to an existing customer.

required_parameters.name: cardNonce
required_parameters.description: A card nonce representing the credit card to link to the customer.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Valid AccessToken.

required_parameters.name: customerId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the customer to link the card on file to.

optional_parameters.name: billingPostalCode
optional_parameters.description: The billing address's postal code.

optional_parameters.name: billingAddressLine1
optional_parameters.description: The first line of the buyer's billing address.

optional_parameters.name: billingAddressLine3
optional_parameters.description: The third line of the buyer's billing address.

optional_parameters.name: billingAdministrativeDistrictLevel2
optional_parameters.description: A civil entity within the address's administrative_district_level_1 of the buyer's billing address.

optional_parameters.name: billingSublocality3
optional_parameters.description: A civil region within the address's sublocality2 of the buyer's billing address.

optional_parameters.name: billingSublocality
optional_parameters.description: A civil region within the address's locality of the buyer's billing address.

optional_parameters.name: billingCountry
optional_parameters.description: The billing address's country, in ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 format.

optional_parameters.name: billingAddressLine2
optional_parameters.description: The second line of the buyer's billing address.

optional_parameters.name: cardholderName
optional_parameters.description: The cardholder's name.

optional_parameters.name: billingAdministrativeDistrictLevel1
optional_parameters.description: A civil entity within the address's country of the buyer's billing address. In the US, this is the state.

optional_parameters.name: billingLocality
optional_parameters.description: The city or town of the buyer's billing address.

optional_parameters.name: billingSublocality2
optional_parameters.description: A civil region within the address's sublocality of the buyer's billing address.

optional_parameters.name: billingAdministrativeDistrictLevel3
optional_parameters.description: A civil entity within the address's administrative_district_level_2 of the buyer's billing address.

api_list.name: createRefund
api_list.description: This endpoint allows to create a refund

required_parameters.name: locationId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the original transaction's associated location.

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description: The amount of money, in the lowest in the smallest denomination of the currency indicated by currency. For example, when currency_code is USD, amount is in cents.

required_parameters.name: idempotencyKey
required_parameters.description: A value you specify that uniquely identifies this refund among refunds you've created for the tender.

required_parameters.name: tenderId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the tender to refund.

required_parameters.name: transactionId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the original transaction that includes the tender to refund.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Valid AccessToken.

required_parameters.name: currency
required_parameters.description: The type of currency, in ISO 4217 format. For example, the currency code for US dollars is USD.

optional_parameters.name: reason
optional_parameters.description: A description of the reason for the refund. Default value: Refund via API

api_list.name: deleteCustomerCard
api_list.description: This endpoint removes a card on file from a customer.

required_parameters.name: customerId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the customer to delete.

required_parameters.name: cardId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the card on file to delete.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Valid AccessToken.

api_list.name: deleteSingleCustomer
api_list.description: This endpoint deletes a customer from a business, along with any linked cards on file.

required_parameters.name: customerId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the customer to delete.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Valid AccessToken.

api_list.name: getAccessToken
api_list.description: This endpoint allows to obtain accessToken from SquareECommerce.

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: API secret obtained from Square ECommerce.

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description: Authorization code.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: API key obtained from Square ECommerce.

api_list.name: getCustomers
api_list.description: This endpoint returns lists a business's customers.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Valid AccessToken.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint. Provide this to retrieve the next set of results for your original query.

api_list.name: getLocations
api_list.description: This endpoint provides the details for all of a business's locations.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Valid AccessToken.

api_list.name: getRefunds
api_list.description: This endpoint returns lists refunds for one of a business's locations.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Valid AccessToken.

required_parameters.name: locationId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the location to list refunds for.

optional_parameters.name: sortOrder
optional_parameters.description: The order in which results are listed in the response (ASC for oldest first, DESC for newest first). Default value: DESC

optional_parameters.name: beginTime
optional_parameters.description: The beginning of the requested reporting period, in RFC 3339 format (2016-01-31T00:00:00Z). Default value: The current time minus one year.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint. Provide this to retrieve the next set of results for your original query.

optional_parameters.name: endTime
optional_parameters.description: The end of the requested reporting period, in RFC 3339 format (2016-01-31T00:00:00Z). Default value: The current time.

api_list.name: getSingleCustomer
api_list.description: This endpoint returns details for a single customer.

required_parameters.name: customerId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the customer to retrieve.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Valid AccessToken.

api_list.name: getTransactions
api_list.description: This endpoint returns lists transactions for a particular location.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Valid AccessToken.

required_parameters.name: locationId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the location to list transactions for.

optional_parameters.name: sortOrder
optional_parameters.description: The order in which results are listed in the response (ASC for oldest first, DESC for newest first). Default value: DESC

optional_parameters.name: beginTime
optional_parameters.description: The beginning of the requested reporting period, in RFC 3339 format (2016-01-31T00:00:00Z). Default value: The current time minus one year.

optional_parameters.name: endTime
optional_parameters.description: The end of the requested reporting period, in RFC 3339 format (2016-01-31T00:00:00Z). Default value: The current time.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint. Provide this to retrieve the next set of results for your original query.

api_list.name: refreshAccessToken
api_list.description: This endpoint allows to renew acceesToken.

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: API secret obtained from Square ECommerce.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: API key obtained from Square ECommerce.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: accessToken obtained from getAccessToken method.

api_list.name: retrieveSingleTransaction
api_list.description: This endpoint allows to retrieve details for a single transaction.

required_parameters.name: locationId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the location to list transactions for.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Valid AccessToken.

required_parameters.name: transactionId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the transaction.

api_list.name: revokeSingleAccessToken
api_list.description: This endpoint allows to revoke an access token generated with the OAuth flow.

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: API secret obtained from Square ECommerce.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: accessToken obtained from getAccessToken method.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: API key obtained from Square ECommerce.

api_list.name: revokeTokens
api_list.description: This endpoint allows to revoke all merchant's access tokens.

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: API secret obtained from Square ECommerce.

required_parameters.name: merchantId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the merchant whose token you want to revoke.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: API key obtained from Square ECommerce.

api_list.name: updateCustomer

required_parameters.name: accessToken

required_parameters.name: customerId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the customer to update.

optional_parameters.name: companyName
optional_parameters.description: The name of the customer's company.

optional_parameters.name: addressLine1
optional_parameters.description: The first line of the address.

optional_parameters.name: addressSublocality3
optional_parameters.description: A civil region within the address's sublocality2, if any.

optional_parameters.name: addressPostalCode
optional_parameters.description: The address's postal code.

optional_parameters.name: referenceId
optional_parameters.description: An optional second ID you can set to associate the customer with an entity in another system.

optional_parameters.name: addressLine3
optional_parameters.description: The third line of the address, if any.

optional_parameters.name: addressSublocality
optional_parameters.description: A civil region within the address's locality, if any.

optional_parameters.name: givenName
optional_parameters.description: The customer's given (i.e., first) name.

optional_parameters.name: addressAdministrativeDistrictLevel2
optional_parameters.description: A civil entity within the address's administrative_district_level_1. In the US, this is the county.

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: The customer's email address.

optional_parameters.name: addressLine2
optional_parameters.description: The second line of the address, if any.

optional_parameters.name: phoneNumber
optional_parameters.description: The customer's phone number.

optional_parameters.name: nickname
optional_parameters.description: A nickname for the customer.

optional_parameters.name: addressSublocality2
optional_parameters.description: A civil region within the address's sublocality, if any.

optional_parameters.name: note
optional_parameters.description: An optional note to associate with the customer.

optional_parameters.name: familyName
optional_parameters.description: The customer's family (i.e., last) name.

optional_parameters.name: addressCountry
optional_parameters.description: The address's country, in ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 format.

optional_parameters.name: addressAdministrativeDistrictLevel3
optional_parameters.description: A civil entity within the address's administrative_district_level_2, if any.

optional_parameters.name: addressAdministrativeDistrictLevel1
optional_parameters.description: A civil entity within the address's country. In the US, this is the state.

optional_parameters.name: addressLocality
optional_parameters.description: The city or town of the address.

api_list.name: voidSingleTransaction
api_list.description: This endpoint allows to cancel a transaction that was created with the Charge endpoint with a delay_capture value of true.

required_parameters.name: locationId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the location to list transactions for.

required_parameters.name: transactionId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the transaction.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Valid AccessToken.
